trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The caring Nu Mou is worried for their familiar.
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_TODO_00<tab>Pick full-blown lilies south of Sextuplet Shallow.
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the full-blown lilies to the caring Nu Mou.
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_000<tab>Please, mortal, I require your aid. My precious porxie has been under the weather of late, and it needs some full-blown lilies to get better.
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_001<tab>However, I cannot leave its side to do the picking. If you would go in my stead, I promise to give you a fitting payment.
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_002<tab>Please, pick some full-blown lilies in my stead. I would go myself, but I cannot leave my precious porxie's side.
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_010<tab>Ah, you're back. Do you have the lilies?
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_011<tab>You have my gratitude! Now my precious porxie can recover!
TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_012<tab>Will I feed it the lilies, you ask? After a fashion. Being an arcane entity, it cannot simply eat them.

TEXT_LUCKZD006_03413_THOUGHTFULNUMOU0_000_013<tab>Instead, I will infuse it with the flowers' aether. To the creature, it would be as drinking sweet nectar─a sure way to lift the spirits! My thanks again, and please accept this as fitting payment for your kindness!
